articles.title: Trump administration accuses George Mason University of illegally using race in faculty hiring
articles.description: The Trump administration has notified George Mason University President Gregory Washington that he has 10 days to accept a proposed resolution correcting his alleged violations of using race in faculty hiring.

articles.title: Tour bus rollover kills 5 on interstate highway in western New York
articles.description: A tour bus carrying 52 people crashed on an interstate highway in western New York, resulting in five fatalities. The bus was en route from Niagara Falls to New York City when the driver lost control.

articles.title: FBI searches home and office of ex-Trump national security adviser John Bolton
articles.description: The FBI has searched the home and office of former national security adviser John Bolton as part of an investigation into classified materials. The search warrant was reportedly obtained with intelligence provided by the CIA director.
